text: is a railway station in Miyako, Fukuoka Prefecture, Japan. It is on the Tagawa Line, operated by the Heisei Chikuhō Railway. Trains arrive roughly every 30 minutes. ==Platforms== ==External links== *Saigawa Station (Heisei Chikuhō Railway website) ==References== Category:Railway stations in Fukuoka Prefecture Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1897 Category:Heisei Chikuhō Railway Tagawa Line
title: Saigawa Station
